attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To replace the House of Lords with a House of the People where all legislation passed by the House of Representatives ( Commons ) is then presented to the people for voting . If within the maximum time allowed a minimum chorum of people vote the vote becomes binding and the bill is accepted or rejected on this basis . If a chorum is not reached the bill is automatically passed . The voting being by the Internet .
